title: React Employee Directory
alt: An image of the deployed application, Employee Directory
description: This assignment was to develop and deploy an interactive employee table using React. This application can easily filter and sort large employee database files that are in JSON format.

title: Eat Da Burger
alt: An image of the Eat Da Burger application
description: Assignment to create and deploy a burger-devouring application. This application utilizes: Express, MySQL and Handlebars. I also learned and applied Foundation as a front-end framework.

title: Password Generator
alt: An image of the Password Generator deployed online
description: Assignment to build a password generator using vanilla JavaScript.

title: Employee Management System
alt: An image of Employee Tracker being used on the command line
description: Assignment to create a CLI application to manage an employee database.

title: Take Notes
alt: An image of Take Notes deployed
description: This assignment was to take pre-existing front-end code and build the back-end utilizing NodeJS and Express.
